texts.es: La joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 28 años de edad y vivir en una zona de alto riesgo, se dedica a la venta de flan, charamuscas  y gelatinas su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia y tiene mucha clientela ya que es un alimento muy vendible, la jiven vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de gelatinas de sabor, flan, leche, frutas, azúcar, etc. y asi poder continuar vendiendo y obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: The young woman's face is pixelated because she's 28 years old and lives in a dangerous area. She makes a living selling flan, candies, and gelatins. Her business is located in her home and she has many customers because this food sells very well. The young woman lives in her own home with her family unit and she's requesting a loan to purchase flavored gelatins, flan, milk, fruit, sugar, etc. so she can continue selling and obtain higher income.

loans.use: To purchase flavored gelatins, flan, milk, fruit, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Guido

texts.es:
Guido vive en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, y por medio de esa profesión quiere poder ayudar a las demás personas.
El se esta esforzando bastante para poder crecer y ser alguien en la vida por medio de sus estudios. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus útiles de la universidad y de esa forma poder seguir con sus metas.
texts.en:
Guido lives in the city of San Lorenzo, and is studying for a career in nursing. Through this profession he hopes to help other people. 

He is putting forth a lot of effort to grow and be someone in life through his studies. He is requesting a loan so that he can buy the supplies he needs for the university and in this way be able to continue pursuing his goals.

loans.use: to buy supplies for his studies.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador de 57 años de edad, es un comerciante en pequeño, no posee ningún tipo de nivel académico ya que sus padres no le dieron la oportunidad de mandarlo a estudiar. Está acompañado  y de dicho hogar han procreado un hijo.  

Desde que tenía 14 años,  Salvador ya trabajaba como jornalero para trabajos agrícolas a los 20 años se acompañó y trabajo como vigilante de un banco, luego ya no realizo esta actividad puesto que su compañera de vida decidió poner un puesto de venta de pupusas en el mercado y él le ayudaba mucho a trabajar en dicho negocio, luego desde hace 8 años decidieron surtir una tienda en la casa;  entonces él se dedica al comercio ya que le ha dado buenos resultados económicos.

El dinero de este préstamo, es para comprar  productos de la canasta básica tales como frijol, arroz, azúcar, café etc. ya que hasta el momento ha bajado mucho la productividad de la tienda, debido a ya que las personas buscan muchos productos que no los encuentran y  él necesita cubrir y tenerlos en su negocio.

Él tiene un sueño que desea cumplir y es poder tener su tienda muy surtida y sabe que lo puede lograr con la ayuda de su crédito; así podrá tener más productos para poner en venta y tener mayores ganancias y de esta manera pagar las cuotas de su crédito y con las ganancias ir surtiendo más su negocio
texts.en:
Salvador is 57 years old, and is a small-scale trader. He has no academic qualifications as his parents never gave him the opportunity to study. He has a partner and they have one child.

Since the age of 14, Salvador worked as an agricultural labourer. At 20, he met his partner and worked as a bank security guard. He then left that job because his partner decided to set up a market stall selling pupusas - traditional meat or cheese-filled corn tortillas from El Salvador - and he used to help her out a lot with the business. Eight years ago, they decided to establish a store in their home, and since then, she makes a living as a trader, which has given good financial results..

This loan is to buy basic household goods such as beans, rice, sugar, coffee, etc. as the productivity of his shop has been falling. This is because people come to his shop to look for products and are unable to find them, and he needs to buy and have them in his store. 

Salvador has a dream. He wants to have a well-stocked shop and he knows that he can achieve this with the help of his loan. He can stock more products to sell and boost his earnings, and in this way, make his loan repayments, and with the profits he makes, restock his store.

loans.use: to buy beans, rice, sugar, coffee and other items, as the productivity of his shop has been falling.

loans.name: Noel

texts.en:
Noel is 27 and still single. He owns and operates a motorcycle transport service in his village and has been doing this for almost three years. He earns a net income of PHP 400 daily.

Because he has insufficient funds for his transportation business, he would like to avail himself of a loan amounting to PHP 9,000 to pay for the repairs and maintenance that his motorcycle needs. He's hoping that his business will continue to improve and become more profitable.

loans.use: to pay for repairs and maintenance on his motorcycle.

loans.name: Maksatbek

texts.ru: Максатбек, 49 лет, женат, отец 3 детей. У Максатбека среднее образование, на протяжении 20 долгих лет он занимается разведением скота и полеводством. У Максатбека в хозяйстве на сегодняшний день есть 7 коров и 5 телят, также на земельном наделе 1,50 ГА собственной земли, Максатбек выращивает картофель и кукурузу. Дополнительно Максатбек занимается пчеловодством, у него 50 ящиков пчелосемей. Максатбек очень добрый, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. Он берется за любую работу, чтобы иметь возможность дать достойное образование и воспитание его младшим детям, которые в свою очередь с удовольствием помогают отцу по хозяйству. Для дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Максатбек обратился в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят и овец. Доходы от кредита он планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства, а также на улучшение материального положения его семьи.
texts.en: Maksatbek is 49 years old, married and a father of 3 children. Maksatbek has a secondary education and has been involved in raising livestock and farming for 20 long years. Today Maksatbek's business consists of 7 cows and 5 calves, and also 1.50 hectares of owned land, where he grows potatoes and corn. Additionally, Maksatbek is involved in beekeeping and has 50 beehives. Maksatbek is a very kind, honest and reliable person. He takes any job in order to provide a decent education and upbringing for his younger children, who in-turn happily help their father with the household. In order to further develop his business, Maksatbek requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy calves and sheep. He plans to use the earnings from the loan to develop his business and also to improve his family's financial situation.

loans.use: to buy calves and sheep in order to develop his business

loans.name: Ibrahim

texts.en:
Ibrahim is a 31-year-old married man with one child. He lives with his family in the capital city of Sana'a. Ibrahim studied up to Elementary school level education. Unfortunately, Ibrahim could not complete his studies. Recently, he has become the sole breadwinner of the family and his income is not enough to cover all the expenses of the family.  His house lacks furniture and some of the furniture in it is very old. Ibrahim wants to provide his own house with new furniture but he doesn't have enough money to do that. For this reason, he applied for a loan of 60,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase furniture for his house.

Ibrahim looks forward to provide his own house with new furniture and home appliances.

loans.use: to purchase furniture for his house.

loans.name: Adela

texts.es:
Adela estudia Nutrición, esta cursando el primer año, a la vez que estudia también trabaja, y por medio de ello lucha para poder cubrir sus estudios.
Adela quiere ayudar a las personas por medio de sus conocimientos, y que de esa forma pueda cumplir con su meta. Pide este préstamo para poder pagar los gastos de su tesis, de manera a poder cubrir ese gasto que tiene y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Adela is studying nutrition and is in the first year of her course. At the same time as she is  going to school, she is also working, and through this she strives to be able to cover her educational expenses. 

Adela wants to help people through her knowledge and in this way she can fulfill her goal. She is asking for this loan so that she can pay her thesis expenses and cover this expense that she has. This will be a big help to her.

loans.use: To pay thesis expenses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wood, varnish, nails, paint, etc.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is a 32-year-old man. He is married to Tabitha, who adds additional income to support their family. They are blessed with five children. George has been operating a quarrying business for a period of three years, earning himself an income of KES 20,000 at the end of every month.

George is now servicing his third loan of KES 60,000 and intends to use this amount to build a quarrying stall and to buy additional quarry stones to sell to his customers.

George plans to use the anticipated income to pay school fees for his children and hopes to become a quarrying wholesaler-distributor in his hometown.

loans.use: to construct a quarrying stall and buy additional quarry stones.

loans.name: Freddy Antonio

texts.es: La comidas rápidas son el negocio de Freddy, un hombre de 43 años que habita en el suroccidente de la ciudad, con su cónyuge y sus 2 hijas en las edades de 1 y 10 años. Su negocio inició cuando su vecina quitó este mismo negocio, dejando un espacio de mercado insatisfecho. Como el negocio estaba en la esquina de su casa logró con la ayuda de su cónyuge,  con  recursos propios,  empezaron a comprar los equipos necesarios para abordar la clientela abandonada por su vecina. Sus ventas hoy en dia las hace de contado y los sábados feriados y domingos, desde las 3 de la tarde hasta las 12 de la noche, ofreciendole los deliciosos perros calientes, sanduches, carnicos asados etc a sus vecinos y a transeúntes que pasan por este corredor comercial. En la actualidad está aplicando aun credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace la  Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual Comprará embutidos, carnes frías, bolsas de papa, carnes, pollos, salsas, etc. Con esta inversión incrementará la productividad y disminuirá los costos de producción, para ganar un poco mas y hacer que su negocio mejore.
texts.en: Fast food is Freddy's business.  He is a 43-year old man who lives in the southwest of the city with his wife and their two children, who are 1- and 10-years old respectively.  Freddy started his business when his neighbor quit running her fast food business, leaving a space of unmet need.  As the business was in the corner of her house, Freddy and his wife used their own resources to start buying the equipment they needed to serve the customers who were abandoned by his neighbor.  Today, Freddy runs a cash business on Saturdays, Sundays and holidays.  From 3:00 o'clock in the afternoon until midnight, Freddy sells delicious hotdogs, sandwiches, roast meats etc. to his neighbors and to the passers-by who come through his commercial area.  Freddy is currently requesting a Credikiva, his first financing with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With the loan, he will purchase cold cuts, cold meats, bags of potatoes, meat, chicken, salsas, etc.  With this investment, Freddy will increase his productivity and decrease his production costs so he can earn a little more and improve his business.

loans.use: to purchase cold cuts, cold meats, bags of potatoes, meat, chicken, salsas, etc.

loans.name: Maria Del Carmen

texts.es: María de 59 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hermana, ella se dedica desde hace 10 años a la elaboración y venta de pan dulce, la panadería la  tiene ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela, maría esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, levadura, azúcar, etc. Para continuar con la elaboración y así tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
María is 59 years old, she lives in her own home with her sister and she has spent the past ten years making and selling sweet bread for a living. She has a bakery located in her home and she has a lot of customers. 

María is requesting a loan to buy flour, yeast, sugar, etc to continue production and to make a larger profit.

loans.use: to buy flour, yeast, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Merly

texts.es: Merly de 35 años de edad, se dedica al negocio de alquiler de lavadoras y también vende minutos y recargas en sus instalaciones ubicadas en su hogar, conformado por su cónyuge y sus 5 hijos de 2 a 20 años. Merly en el año 2013 , justamente en el mes de Julio, inició su propia aventura de negocios, aprovechando que su hermana propietaria anterior de este negocio, se lo dejó y ella con esfuerzo Merly lo asumió, obteniendo buenos resultados hasta la fecha. En su negocio sus vecinos alquilan a ella lavadoras, para hacer mas eficiente, su día a día familiar y  Merly al mismo tiempo, aprovecha este mercado, para venderle los minutos y recargas a celulares, que son servicios muy solicitado por su vecindad. Su meta es ampliar el servicio de alquiler de lavadoras, pues cada vez son mas los clientes que lo solicitan y estos  deben esperar, a que regresen las máquinas, o peor aun, se van insatisfechos por no encontrar soluciones a  sus necesidades. En la actualidad Merly está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará 2 lavadoras y recargas a celulares. Con esta inversión su negocio mejorará sustancialmente, porque obtendrá mayores utilidades que representan así mismo más ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Merly, 35 years old, makes a living renting out washing machines. And she also sells cell phone minutes and recharging at her facilities, located at her home, which includes her domestic partner and her five children, ages two to twenty. In the month of July, the year 2013, Merly began her own business venture, taking advantage of the fact that her sister, who was the previous owner of this business, left it to her. Merly made an effort and took it on, and so far she has had good results. 

At her business, the neighbors rent washing machines from her, to make their day-to-day family lives more efficient. And at the same time, Merly takes advantage of that market to sell them cell phone minutes and recharging, services that are in high demand in her neighborhood. Her goal is to expand the washing machine rental service, because increasing numbers of clients are requesting it and they have to wait for the machines to be returned, or worse yet, they leave unsatisfied because they do not find a solution to their needs. 

Merly is currently applying for a Kiva loan, the first loan that she has requested from the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, which she will use to buy two washing machines and cell phone chargers. With this investment, her business will improve substantially, because she will have higher profits and thus more family income.

loans.use: to buy two washing machines and cell phone chargers.

loans.name: Omayra

texts.es: Omaira de 37 años de edad se dedica a la preparación y venta de comidas rápidas . Ella en su condición de separada y madre de 2 hijos en las edades de de 15 y 18, se esfuerza cada día para que salgan adelante y sean educados como profesionales con potencial de éxito futuro. Desde hace 10 años, por tradición familiar dio curso a su inspiración de ser independiente, la cual desde muy niña lo demostró trabajando para almacenes grandes y acumulando experiencia para cuando estuviera lista como adulta. En su negocio ofrece perros calientes, hamburguesas, pizzas pollo, carnes etc desde un punto de venta ubicado en el barrio donde habita y donde promueve su negocio mediante avisos y publicidad mano a mano. Sus ventas las realiza de contado trabajando desde las 3 de la tarde hasta las 12 de la noche diariamente, y compra en almacenes especializados de insumos de comidas rápidas para que sus compras le generen un mas bajo costo de producción y poder vender de manera competitiva. Su meta de crecimiento, desarrollo y expansión no se detienes, por eso ha acudido a a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para aplicar a un crédkiva mediante el cual comprará inventarios de materias primas, como carnes frías, salsas, harinas, pollo, productos de panadería etc, con el fin de mejorar aun mas su negocio incrementando su capital de trabajo para surtirlo e incrementar su productividad y su nivel de ventas y utilidades.
texts.en: Omaira is 37 years old and works in the preparation and sale of fast food. She's a single mother of 2 children ages 15 and 18, and she works hard every day so they can move forward and become professionals with an opportunity to be successful in the future. 10 years ago she followed the footsteps of her family and came up with the idea of setting up her own business. Since she was a little girl she proved herself working for large warehouses and acquired experience so she would be ready as an adult. In her business she sells hot dogs, hamburgers, pizzas, chicken, meats, etc from a location in the neighborhood where she lives. She promotes her business with signs and leaflets. Her selling is done through cash starting at 3 pm and finishing at 12 am every day and she buys from warehouses that specialize in fast food ingredients to reduce her production costs and sell at competitive prices. Her goal is still growth, development and expansion and that's why she has gone to the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation to apply for a credikiva. She'll use it to purchase stocks of ingredients such as cold cuts, salsas, flour, chicken, baked goods, etc with the objective of improving her business by increasing the working capital to stock her inventory and boost productivity, sales, and profits.

loans.use: To purchase stocks of ingredients such as cold cuts, salsas, flour, chicken, and baked goods.

loans.name: Yonis Esaú

texts.es: Yonis de 27 años de edad,  esta solicitando un nuevo crédito,  para poner el techo de su casa, comprara lamina, polines, debido a que con el crédito anterior no logro terminar de reparar el techo.
texts.en: Yonis is 27 years old, and he is requesting a new loan to put a roof on his home, and buy sheeting and matting. This is because he didn't manage to finish repairing the roof with the previous loan.

loans.use: to put a roof on his home, and buy sheeting and matting.

loans.name: Balentin De Jesus

texts.es: Balentin de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, desde hace varios años el se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y los comercializa en los diferentes mercados, ya tiene clientela establecida, con las ganancias logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Balentin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado, vitaminas y mas cerdos y seguir con la crianza de los mismo y asi tener mejores ingresos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Balentin, 62 years old, lives in his own home with his family. For several years he has made a living raising pigs, and he sells them at the different markets. He has an established clientele, and with his earnings he manages to pay for some of his household expenses.

Balentin is requesting a loan to buy feed, vitamins, and more pigs and to continue raising them in order to have higher income and to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy feed, vitamins, and more pigs.

loans.name: Jakeline Alejandrina

texts.es: Jakeline de 35 años de edad es madre soltera vive en casa propia con sus tres hijos, ella posee desde hace 4 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de sopas, golosinas, huevos, refrescos, detergentes, etc. y asi obtener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Jakeline is a 35-year-old single mother who lives in her own home with her three children. She has owned a small shop, which is located in her home, for the past four years.

She is requesting a loan to buy soups, candies, eggs, beverages, detergents, etc to gain a larger profit.

loans.use: to buy soups, candies, eggs, beverages, detergents, etc.

loans.name: Rosa Edelmira

texts.es: Rosa de 69 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo de 27 años de edad quien trabaja y le ayuda económicamente, ella se dedica a la confección de compra y tiene mucha clientela por su buen trabajo, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo y la ayuda de su hijo logran solventar os gastos del hogar, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de hilos, agujas, telas, elásticos, etc. y continuar con su trabajo para tener mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Rosa is 69  years old and lives in her own home with her 27-year-old son who works and helps her financially.  She is a seamstress and has a considerable clientele because of her good work.  With what she gets from her work, and with the help of her son, she manages to cover the household expenses. 

She is requesting a loan so that she can buy thread, needles, fabric, elastic, etc., and continue with her work in order to have better earnings.

loans.use: To buy thread, needles, fabric, elastic, etc.

loans.name: Las Azucenas De Chaullay Centro Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS AZUCENAS DE CHAULLAY CENTRO” de la Asociación Arariwa y viven en la comunidad de Chaullay del distrito de Maranura de la provincia de La Convencion, Cusco, Peru. 

La Socia Cintia ,la socia continua dedicándose a la crianza de animales menores  animales, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracia al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez continua dedicándose a la agricultura donde tiene plantaciones de café y cacao, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta ,manera seguir apoyando a su familia. 
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de abono y semillas.
Los demás socios se dedican a la ganadería, a la agricultura,  a la venta de comida, crianza de animales menores y otros brindan servicios profesionales. Los socios agradecen a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The group members belong to Asociación Arariwa's "Las Azucenas de Chaullay Centro" ["The Lilies of the Center of Chaullay"] communal bank, and live in the community of Chaullay, in Maranura district in the province of La Convención, Cusco, Peru.

Group member Cintia continues to make a living rearing small animals. She has had this business for a long time, and it is going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day. She also still works in agriculture, with her coffee and cocoa plantations. She hopes that she can continue to work in this way so that she can keep supporting her family.

Cintia is requesting the loan to buy compost and seeds. 

The other group members work in livestock farming, selling food, rearing small animals, and others provide professional services. 

The group members are grateful to those who form part of this dream through Kiva, and are committed to making their loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy compost and seeds.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MAQUIMANTA PURISUN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio es el Sr. Guillermo; el socio continua dedicándose a trabajar en el sector educación, el socio a la vez se dedica a la venta de libros, él socio  desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera pueda continuar apoyando a su familia, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso.
El  socio solicita el préstamo para la compra de libros.
El socio se siente agradecido por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower belongs to the "Maquimata Purisun" communal bank, located in Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.  The borrower Guillermo is still working in the educational sector. At the same time he sells books. He wishes to be able to continue working, to in this way continue supporting his family. He is a responsible and hard-working person.

He is requesting a loan in order to buy books. He feels grateful for the loan, and promises to make his installment payments.

loans.use: To buy books.

loans.name: Nayid Esther

texts.es: Nayid Es una mujer que habita al suroccidente dela ciudad con su cónyuge y tiene 3 hijos en las edades de 16 a 29 años. Ella fue inducida por su nuera a que emprendiera un negocio de venta de articulos de plata, aprovechando que existía una clientela conocida por esta en el departamento dela Guajira, especialmente en Maicao pueblo fronterizo y en Riohacha la capital. Así fue como hace 4 alos en Febrero del año 2010 inició su emprendimiento y hoy la demanda es mayor y tiene exigencias de nuevos artículos en plata. Satisfecha con este negocio, Nayid vende de contado y a crédito viajando cada 15 días y trabaja diariamente en la ciudad, desde las 4 de la tarde hasta las 8 de la noche. Su meta es ampliar su negocio y tener un local propio además de comprar una casa y adquirir otro vehículo público. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará accesorios de plata, cadenas, aretes, pulseras,relojes, y tobilleras, con las que tiene compromiso de responderle a su clientela. Con esta inversión sus ventas y sus utilidades se incrementarán haciendo de su credikiva una inversión exitosa, pues impacta positivamente a su negocio
texts.en:
Nayid is a woman who lives in the southwest of the city with her husband. She has three children between the ages of 16 and 29. She was encouraged by her daughter-in-law to set up a business of selling silver articles, taking advantage of the existence of a known clientele for this in the department of La Guajira, especially in Maicao, a border town, and in Riohacha, the capital. That is how four years ago, in February of 2010, she began her endeavor, and now the demand is greater and she has demands for new articles in silver. Satisfied with this business, Nayid sells for cash and on credit, collecting every two weeks, and she works daily in the city from 4 in the afternoon to 8 at night. Her goal is to expand her business and have her own shop, in addition to buying a house and acquiring another vehicle. 

She is now applying for a Kiva loan, the first financing that she has had from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy silver accessories, chains, earrings, bracelets, watches, and ankle bracelets, for which she has commitments to respond to her customers. With this investment, her sales and her profits will increase, making her Kiva loan a successful investment, since it will positively impact her business.

loans.use: to buy silver accessories, chains, earrings, bracelets, watches, and ankle bracelets

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan de 36 años de edad,  estudio hasta 3° año de bachillerato, se caso a los 26 años y a procreado  un hijo que actualmente esta estudiando 5° grado. Su esposa se dedica al comercio, a la venta de productos de primera necesidad. 

Juan  trabaja el cultivo del frijol desde hace unos 25 años, ya que su padre lo involucro a él y sus hermanos a cultivar y a ser grandes productores en la zona; él trabaja de 7:00 am a 12:00 md. También tiene un ingreso por trabajar en una empresa eléctrica. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes para cultivar una frijolera que tiene, sus necesidades serán satisfechas, ya que podrá tener un buen rendimiento en la cosecha. Él sueña que su cultivo se desarrolle en buen estado y que tenga un alto rendimiento.
texts.en:
Juan, 36, studied up to the third year of secondary school, married at 26 years old, and has procreated a son who is now studying in the fifth grade.  His wife makes a living in commerce selling products of basic necessity.
Juan has worked in the cultivation of beans since he was 25 years old when his father got him and his brothers involved in farming and being big producers in the zone.  He works from 7:00 a.m. to noon.  He also has an income from working in an electric company.
The loan he is requesting is for the purchase of fertilizers to cultivate a bean field he has.  His necessities will be satisfied since he will be able have a good return at harvest.  He dreams that his crop develops in good condition and that he has a high return.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers in order to cultivate a bean field.

loans.name: Abadia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAQUIMANTA PURISUN”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia es la Sra. Abadia; la socia sigue dedicándose a su negocio de carpintería, la socia continua elaborando mesas, camas entre otros para todos sus clientes que le solictan, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera continuar apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de madera.
La socia se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Maquimanta Purisun". The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco. 

The member is named Abadia and she continues to work in her carpentry business, making tables and beds among other things, for all her customers who request them. She wants to be able to continue working so she can continue supporting her family. 

The member is requesting the loan to buy wood. She is thankful for the loan and she promises to pay the installments.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Osmin Anibal

texts.es: Osmin de 39 años de edad vive con su esposa en casa propia, no tiene hijos todavía, el se dedica al cultivo de platanos desde hace 10 años y cuando ya esta la cosecha la comercializa en los mercados y tiene clientela establecida que lo prefieren por la calidad del producto y los buenos precios, Osmin esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas herbicidas, etc. para poder obtener un mejor cultivo, mejores ganancias y una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Osmin is 39 years old, lives with his wife in his own home, and doesn't have any children yet. He has worked in banana growing for 10 years and when the harvest comes he sells it at the markets to an established customer base that prefers him because of the quality of the product and good prices. Osmin is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc to be able to grow a better crop, increase profit, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: To purchase fertilizers, manure, pesticides, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Nayruth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MAQUIMANTA PURISUN, este banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Nayruth, la socia continua dedicándose al negocio de  venta de autopartes para carros, la socia continua vendiendo parabrisas, llantas entre otros, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta manera continuar apoyando a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de siliconas entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en:
Group member Nayruth belongs to the "Maquimanta Purisun" communal bank, located in the district of Cusco, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Nayruth still makes a living with her business selling spar care parts. She continues to sell windscreens, tyres and other items. She hopes to continue working so that she can keep supporting her family. 

Nayruth is requesting the loan to buy rubber parts and other items. She is grateful for the loan granted to her and is committed to making her loan repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy rubber parts and other items.

loans.name: Anniza

texts.en: Her dream is to become a successful chef someday. Anniza is studying in the university, taking up Hotel and Restaurant Management. She resides in Pagadian City with her family and five siblings. Her parents are fishing barb makers and suppliers. They earn better income from this. She became a member of Gata Daku MPC recently and has borrowed a loan to pay her school tuition fees for the first semester. She is thankful to GDMPC for being a part of her life's journey.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Nalieng Group

texts.en: Sengchan's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams. However, the water from natural sources in Sengchan's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Sengchan is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and other water borne diseases. Even though some people in the village, including Sengchan’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money used to purchase bottled water. Sengchan's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from 3-5 years.

loans.use: to purchase TerraClear water filters so he can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Sanam

texts.ru: Санам скромная трудолюбивая сельская женщина из района Кубадиён, которой исполнилось в этом месяце 47 лет. Она живет вместе с мужем, взрослыми детьми, свекром и свекровью. Родители мужа пенсионеры, а муж работает таксистом на маршрутной линии района. Они ведут скромную жизнь. Санам хочет принести в дом новый источник дохода и улучшить финансовое состояние семьи. Она планирует начать животноводческий бизнес для которого имеет все условия. На сумму запрашиваемого кредита Санам хочет купить двух голов коров и корм для них. Она будет откармливать скот в течение 30-35 дней и затем продаст по прибыльной цене на скотном рынке. По ее словам ей в деятельности будет помогать муж. Санам нуждается сейчас в финансовой поддержке и просит Вас помочь ей в начинании бизнеса.
texts.en: Sanam is a modest and hardworking rural woman from the Qubadiyon district. She turned 47 years old this month. She lives with her husband, adult children, and parents-in-law. Her husband's parents are retired, and her husband works as a taxi driver along one of the district shuttle routes. They live a modest life. Sanam wants to bring a new source of income into the family and improve her family's financial condition. She is planning to start her own animal husbandry business, for which she has all of the conditions. Sanam wants to use the requested loan amount to buy two cows and livestock feed. She will fatten up livestock for 30-35 days and then sell it at a profitable price at a livestock market. According to her, her husband will help her with this business. Sanam needs financial support now and is asking You to help her with starting her business.

loans.use: to buy two cows and livestock feed in order to start her own business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for university fees.

loans.name: Hector Gonzalo

texts.es: El socio Héctor sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes, el socio continua vendiendo lo que son parabiras, faros entre otros a todos sus clientes que le solictan, siendo de esta manera que el socio saca adelante a su familia. El socio solicita el crédito para comprar parabrisas entre otros. El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas
texts.en: The group member Hector continues working in the sale of auto parts. He's still selling windshields and headlights, among other things, to his customers that order them. This is how he gets his family ahead. He's requesting a loan to purchase windshields, among other things. The group member is grateful for the loan that was granted and he pledges to comply with the agreed upon payments.

loans.use: To buy a windshield, among other things.

loans.name: Ugiloy

texts.ru:
Угилой жительница района Дж.Руми начала свою скотоводческую деятельность 4 года назад. С тех пор она разводит у себя дома мелкорогатый скот для продажи. Ее муж фермер, он также помогает жене в ведении животноводства. 
Угилой в возрасте 27 лет имеет одного ребенка. Она заботливая мать, жена и невестка. Вместе с ними также живут старые родители мужа. Угилой энергичная и шустрая женщина. Она успевает и в ведении домашнего и сельского хозяйства. В данный момент Угилой хочет увеличить поголовье своих мелкорогатых скотин. Для этой цели она запрашивает кредит, так как собственных средств не хватает. На сумму кредита Угилой планирует купить несколько голов молодых овец и барашек. Она надеется на вашу поддержку.
texts.en:
Ugiloy is a resident of the J. Rumy district. She started her animal husbandry business 4 years ago. Since then, she has been raising small livestock at home for sale. Her husband is a farmer and also helps his wife with running the animal husbandry business.

Ugiloy is 27 years old and has one child. She is a caring mother, wife and daughter-in-law. Her husband's elderly parents live with them as well. Ugiloy is an energetic and smart woman. She manages to run both her household and the agricultural business. At the present time, Ugiloy wants to increase her small livestock headcount. She is requesting a loan for this purpose because she does not have enough of her own money. Ugiloy is planning to use the loan amount to buy several young ewes and rams. She hopes for your mercy.

loans.use: to buy several young ewes and rams

loans.name: Furaha Tegeta Group

texts.en:
Anjela, who is in her late 20's is married with three children, one boy and two girls.  Two of them are at school and one is still young.  She has been running a business selling charcoal for six years now.  She works from 5am to midnight and is able to make a very good monthly profit.

This will be Anjela's 10th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to keep on increasing her charcoal stock and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She is doing great with the loan and appreciates Kiva for their support which has made her group, Furaha Tegeta, smile.  

She used the profit to pay school fees, bought a plot of land, built a house and covered household expenses. She will use this loan to buy sacks of charcoal to resell. She dreams of growing her capital to 20 million TZS.

Anjela will share this loan with her loan group "Furaha Tegeta" with consist of two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Raul

texts.es: Raul de 47 años de edad se dedica desde hace 7 años a la venta de medicina popular, comercializa de forma ambulante por los diferentes mercados, tiene mucha clientela por la calidad de los productos y los buenos precios, vive en casa propia con su padre y una tia, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas medicina popular por mayor y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida junto con su familia.
texts.en:
For the last seven years, Raul, 47 years old, has made a living selling popular medicine at different markets. He has a large clientele because of the quality of the products and good prices. He lives in his own house with his father and an aunt.

He is requesting a loan to purchase more popular medicine wholesale and thus have a better quality of life with his family.

loans.use: to buy more popular medicine wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase hair dyes, scissors, shampoo, cosmetics, etc.

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is thankful that she was granted a 14,000 PHP loan, which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her general store. Through her earnings she is able to send her children to school and to meet their daily living expenses.

She would now like to apply for a 16,000 PHP loan, which she will use as part of her working capital to buy more quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, rice noodles, canned goods and condiments etc. She knows that more items in her store will yield more sales and thus increase her earnings. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs and for the education of her children. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her.

Merly dreams of having a bigger general store, and aims to give her children the best education possible for them to have a better future. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God, which she studies. 

*All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro-finance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries, and beverages needed for her business.

loans.name: Serg

texts.en: Serg is a proud son of a farmer and he has four siblings. His family settled for a living in Tukuran Zamboanga del Sur. He is studying seafaring in the university.  He wants to become successful in his studies to have a stable job in the future. He has borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC in order to pay the school tuition fees for the first semester. He is hopeful to gain success through his studies and he is thankful to GDMPC for helping him to continue.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fees for the first semester.

loans.name: Elicelio

texts.es: Elicelio, tiene la edad  de 54 años, esta casado, vive con su esposa, la cual es su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de algunos fertilizantes adecuados para el estado de desarrollo y maduración de la cosecha en que se encuentra el cultivo y también tomar en cuenta la zona y  aplicarlo al cultivo de café en la época adecuada, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo con un buen desarrollo y sanidad para que rápidamente tenga un tamaño parecido al ya plantado y así mejorar la densidad de plantas por área, también realizar algunos trabajos de labores culturales como lo son la conservación de suelos por medio de realización de canales a nivel para que el agua de lluvia no pueda realizar lavados de principalmente en las partes con mas pendientes, con estas nuevas prácticas de trabajo espera cumplir con el objetivo de tener una plantación con mejor sanidad y un suelo con mas fertilidad y por ende una mejor cosecha. Con esta compra de productos adecuados tendrá una calidad mejor de producto para el consumidor. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Elicelio is 54 years old, married, and lives with his wife, who is his greatest priority. With his loan, he plans to buy some fertilizer appropriate for the developmental and maturation stage that the crop is in. He also plans to take the area into account and apply the fertilizer to the coffee crop at the right time, as well as buy some seedbed plants that are well developed and healthy so that they will quickly grow to a size similar to the crop already planted. This will improve the density of plants by area. He also plans to do some cultural work, like soil conservation, by making leveled canals so that the rainwater cannot wash away soil, mainly in the places with the most slope.

With these new practices he hopes to reach his goal of having a healthier plantation, more fertile soil, and thus a better harvest. By buying these appropriate products, he will have a higher-quality product for the consumer. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He had not had other loans from government banks before, but FUDECOSUR has offered him a loan with better payment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy things to help his coffee crop.

loans.name: Josue Francisco

texts.es: Josue Francisco, tiene la edad  de 21 años, esta soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de algunos fertilizantes adecuados para el estado en que se encuentra el cultivo y también tomar en cuenta la zona y  aplicarlo al cultivo de café en la época adecuada, además de comprar algunas plantas de almácigo con un buen desarrollo y sanidad para que rápidamente tenga un tamaño parecido al ya plantado y así mejorar la densidad de plantas por área, también realizar algunos trabajos de labores culturales como lo son la conservación de suelos por medio de realización de canales a nivel para que el agua de lluvia no pueda realizar lavados de principalmente en las partes con mas pendientes, con estas nuevas prácticas de trabajo espera cumplir con el objetivo de tener una plantación con mejor sanidad y un suelo con mas fertilidad y por ende una mejor cosecha. Con esta compra de productos adecuados tendrá una calidad mejor de producto para el consumidor. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Josue Francisco is 21 years old. He is single and lives with his parents and siblings, who are his first priority.

He wants to buy fertilizer with the loan, suitable to the present state of his crops and the area he grows in, to apply it at the appropriate time. He will also buy a few plants from a greenhouse that are well-developed and healthy. They will quickly attain a size similar to those already planted so it will increase the density of plants per area.

He will also do some cultivation work to conserve the soil such as canals at a level that the water from the rains can't wash away the soil in the sloped sections. With these new working practices he hopes to fulfill the objective of having a plantation in better health with more fertile soil and in the end a better harvest. By buying the appropriate products he will have a higher quality product for the consumer.

This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had any loans from the State Banks and FUDECOSUR is offering a loan with better conditions and much lower rate of interest.

loans.use: to plant coffee.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase fertilizers for his bean crop and a wheelbarrow and trowels for his work as a mason.

loans.name: Judith

texts.en:
Judith, 34, is a farmer in Chisamba, Zambia where she lives with her husband and child. She is asking for a loan so that she can obtain a water pump that will help her irrigate and expand her garden.

Because it is the dry season in Zambia, water needs to be applied to the crops regularly, often brought to the garden by buckets from a nearby well or stream. A water pump would significantly reduce Judith’s need for labour and allow her to further expand her crops.

Water pumps can be a major boost for rural farmers such as Judith. A water pump allows farmers to water their crops more regularly, while also increasing the area they cultivate. Unfortunately, the upfront costs of such a water pump can be very prohibitive. 

Rent to Own will deliver a water pump directly to Judith's farm. Rent to Own also provides her with training on how to properly use and maintain the water pump, and will check in to provide support until she has paid off the loan.

loans.use: to obtain a water pump for irrigation

loans.name: Manuel De Jesus

texts.es: Manuel vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, desde hace varios años el se dedica al cultivo de maíz, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la comercializa en los alrededores de la zona, Manuel esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. Y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
Manuel lives in his own house with his family. For several years now he has made a living growing corn. When his harvest is ready he sells it in the surrounding areas. 

Manuel is requesting a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control, weedkiller, etc. and thus be able to have more income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, manure, pest control, weedkiller, etc.

loans.name: Yovana Nancy

texts.es:
La socia sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para carros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia vende su mercadería a todos sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
 La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de faros entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner continues to make a living selling auto parts. She is a responsible and hard-working person. She sells her merchandise to all the clients who make requests, this being the way she gets her family ahead.

The partner is asking for the loan to buy headlights, among other things. She is grateful for the loan given and is committed to complying with her established payments.

loans.use: to buy headlights, among other things.

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en:
Fatima is a 37-year-old married Syrian citizen and the mother of two children. Twelve years ago, she opened her own beauty salon to support her husband, who works as a personal driver with a limited monthly salary, in covering the needs and expenses of their family.

Today, Fatima is acquiring a loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua to renovate her salon’s decor with the aim of attracting more customers and thus increasing her income.

Fatima is a hard worker with a very good reputation in her region. She hopes to keep on developing her business in a well-managed way.

Fatima hopes to expand her business more in the future to provide her children with better living conditions.

loans.use: to renovate her salon’s decor with the aim of attracting more customers and thus increasing her income.

loans.name: Reymond

texts.en:
Reymond is the son of a farmer who lives in Pagadia City with his family. He is studying in University to be a Basic Seaman and he wants to become successful in his future. 

Reymond is seeking to complete his course so that he will be able to work in his field. He joined Gata Daku MPC and took a loan to pay school tuition fees for the first semester. 

He would like to finish his studies and find a job to help his family with part of their expenses.

loans.use: to pay first semester school tuition fees.

loans.name: Yaneth Del Pilar

texts.es: Yaneth tiene un negocio hace dos años, mediante el cual ofrece servicios de telecomunicaciones y a esos mismo clientes les ofrece mercancía variada mediante guías especializadas de productos o catálogos. Su inspiración de tener un negocio es algo natural y como desde muy niña ha negociado con el fin de ser independiente, cuando llegó la oportunidad de comprar un negocio acreditado, realizó todo tipo de gestión del dinero para obtenerlo comprando todo el equipamento para organizar su centro de llamadas. Todos los días desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 10 dela noche, yaneth está al pie de su negocio para generar cada vez mas ingresos,  sus clientes son principalmente trabajadores de los bancos, y su meta es agregar a estos negocios una dulcería, para sacar adelante a su hija de 18 años, con la que sueña verla convertida en una profesional de  calidad. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace ala Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una vitrina para organizar la venta de celulares y una vitrina para agregar dulces e impactar a su clientela.Con esta inversión su negocio mejorará, pues tendrá mas ventas de nuevos productos y mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Yaneth has had a telecommunications business for two years, through which she offers her customers telecommunications services and various merchandise through catalogs. Owning her own business came naturally to her, as she has been business-minded with the goal of independence since she was young. When the opportunity arose to purchase a reputable business, she made enough money to buy the company and all the equipment to organize a call center. Yaneth works every day from 7 am until 10 at night so that she can generate more income. Her clients are mainly employees of banks. Her goal is to add a candy store to her businesses, to help raise her 18 year old daughter, who she dreams of seeing become a professional. 

She is currently requesting a Kiva loan, which is her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, through which she will buy a display cabinet to organize the sale of cell phones, and a display case to sell sweets. This loan will improve her business, as she will have more product sales and higher profits.

loans.use: buy a display cabinet to organize the sale of cell phones, and a display case to sell sweets.

loans.name: Loreta

texts.en: Loreta, is age 51, married, and blessed with eight children. She has owned and managed a vegetable production in their village for almost five years, and she earns a net income of PHP 490 weekly.  Due to insufficient funds in her business, she would like to avail a loan amounting to PHP 10,000 to purchase fertilizers and vegetable seedlings to sell. She's hoping that her business will continue to grow and will become more productive.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and vegetable seedlings to sell.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 24-year-old single man with two children living in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda.

Robert used the previous loan to buy another motorcycle for his transport business. He is still in transport and farming, and faces challenges of limited capital, besides that he has hopes of constructing a better house. Robert has asked for a loan to buy land so that he can have more space for farming.

loans.use: to buy land for farming

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 34-year-old married man with four children living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He has two main activities: transport and farming. He faces hardships of limited capital and unpredictable weather changes. His dream is to see his children attain education to higher levels of learning. 

Moses needs a loan to buy land so that he can expand his crops.

loans.use: to buy land.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn so she can continue making and selling tortillas, and generate more income for herself and her family.

loans.name: Alvard

texts.en:
Alvard is from the Sarnaghbyur village in the Shirak region. She lives with her husband, and their only son is a migrant worker in a neighboring country. Alvard works at a local village school and her husband is a construction worker (specified in internal decoration of houses).

The family is also engaged in the cultivation of barley, wheat and potatos, as well as in raising a livestock of cows, calves, pigs and hens. Alvard and her husband sell the agricultural products in the local market. Farming is an important source of income for the family. To be able to continue their agribusiness in a sustainable way, there is a need to make some investments. 

A loan of USD 1,500 will assist Anna in reaching her goal, enabling her to purchase forage for feeding the livestock. Alvard and her husband will be very thankful to all the lenders for their good will and support in helping them collect the needed loan, and sustain their agribusiness.

loans.use: to pay for forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Defeid

texts.en:
Defeid, 35, is a farmer in Kapiri Mposhi, Zambia. He is asking for a loan so that he can obtain a water pump that will help him irrigate and expand his garden.

Vegetable gardening is an important business for many rural farmers in the Kapiri Mposhi district. Defeid grows vegetables on his small farm to sell to local buyers. Last season he grew onions, cabbage and fresh greens. With the profits he was able to purchase inputs for his field crops. 

Because it is the dry season in Zambia, water needs to be applied to the crops regularly, often brought to the garden by buckets from a nearby well or stream. A water pump would significantly reduce Defeid's need for labour and allow him to further expand his crops.

Rent to Own will deliver a water pump directly to his farm. Rent to Own also provides Defeid with training on how to properly use and maintain the water pump, and will check in to provide support until he has paid off the loan.

loans.use: to obtain a water pump for irrigation

loans.name: Houyhai Group

texts.en: Nuanta's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from those natural sources in Nuanta's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking, without treatment.  The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Nuanta is excited that he, like his group members, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and water-borne diseases. Even though some people in the villages, including Nuanta’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money they would otherwise have used to purchase bottled water. Nuanta and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water, by purchasing less charcoal or wood, and decrease the amount of time they have to spend foraging for firewood. Nuanta's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filter, so his family can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 28-year-old, married father of one child. With his 16 years of experience in aluminum services, he decided a year ago to open his own aluminum services business in an attempt to increase his income, and thus provide his family with better living conditions.

Today, Mahmoud is acquiring a Youth loan from Kiva’s field partner Al Majmoua, to expand his work and to buy necessary aluminum compressing tools, to provide his customers with better and quicker service. Mahmoud hopes to expand his business more in the future, to build a better future for his beloved child.

loans.use: to buy necessary aluminum compressing tools.

loans.name: Flor Alba

texts.es: Flor de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella posee un negocio de venta de ropa desde hace varios años, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su hogar en una zona muy transitada por esa razón posee mucha clientela, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor para damas y caballeros y asi poder obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Flor is 43 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has owned a clothing business for several years now, and it's located close to her home in a very busy area. That's why she has lots of customers. She's requesting a loan to purchase wholesale clothes for ladies and men so that she can increase her income.

loans.use: To purchase clothes wholesale for ladies and men

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials for garbage collection

loans.name: Sabaly Group

texts.fr:
Les cinq membres du groupe SABALY sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 42 ans, et ont en moyenne 5 enfants et vivent la plupart dans des familles traditionnelles à MANCOURANI NATIEN un des quartiers populaire dans la ville de Sikasso 3ème région administrative du Mali. 

Elles sont à leur seizième prêt solidaire avec l’institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso afin de satisfaire le besoin de leur clientèle. 

Madame DJONTA assise à la première position de la droite vers la gauche sur la photo dans ce groupe des femmes SABALY, fait la vente de draps. 
 Elle compte acheter avec son prêt  15 draps au grand marché où elle est beaucoup sollicitée de sa clientèle pour la qualité de ses produits pour la revendre au détail à MANCOURANI NATIEN à une clientèle composée d’homme et de femme au comptant et à crédit. 
 Elle  envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 32 000 francs CFA dont une partie est utilisée pour payer le prêt et son intérêt et l’autre pour son épargne.
texts.en:
The five members of Sabaly group are married women with an average age of 42, and an average of 5 children and live mostly in traditional families in Mancourani Natien, one of thepopular neighborhoods in the city of Sikasso in the 3rd administrative region of Mali. 

They are on their sixteenth loan from the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso to meet the needs of their customers. 

Djonta, sitting first on the right in the photo of the Sabaly group of women, is selling sheets. With this loan, she intends to buy 15 sheets in the big market to resell to the people of Mancourani Natien - a clientele of men and women who pay in cash and credit. They are in high demand by customers for the quality of the products.
  She plans to make an average monthly profit of 32,000 CFA francs, a portion of which is used to pay the loan and interest and another portion for savings.

loans.use: to buy bed linen.

loans.name: Paulino Elias

texts.es: Paulino de 56 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el posee una pequeña tienda desde hace 9 años ubicada en su lugar de residencia, posee mucha clientela por los buenos precios, Paulino esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de mas productos como: sopas, huevos, golosinas, refrescos, granos básicos, etc. y asi obtener mejores ingresos.
texts.en: Paulino is 56 years old and lives in his own home with his wife. He has owned a small store for 9 years, located in his home. His customers are many, because of the good prices. Paulino is requesting a loan to purchase more products such as: soups, eggs, sweets, soft drinks, staple foods, etc. and thus obtain more income.

loans.use: To purchase soups, eggs, sweets, soft drinks, staple foods, etc.

loans.name: Maria Lucia

texts.es: Maria de 55 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, ella se dedica a la elaboración y venta de quesadillas desde hace varios años, su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su lugar de residencia, Doña maria esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de harina, azúcar, huevos, etc. y  moldes como los que muestra en la fotografía para continuar con su trabajo que le genero buenos ingresos.
texts.en: Maria is 55 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She makes and sells quesadillas for a living, which she has been doing for many years. She runs her business out of her home. Maria is currently requesting a loan to buy ingredients such as flour, sugar, eggs, and molds like those shown in the picture, so that she can continue with her work, and generate good income.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, eggs, molds, and more, to make and sell quesadillas.

loans.name: Genoveva Betty

texts.es:
La socia Genoveva Betty sigue  dedicándose al negocio de venta de autopartes para carros, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia vende su mercadería como parabirsas, llantas entre otros a sus cliente que le solicitan, siendo de esta manera que la socias acá adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de faros, adornos entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Genoveva Betty continues working selling parts for cars. She is a responsible and diligent person. She sells merchandise like windshields, tires, etc. to customers on demand. In this way the member gets her family ahead. She is requesting a loan to buy headlights and decorations amongst others. The member is grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the established payments.

loans.use: to buy headlights and decorations amongst others.

loans.name: Evelia

texts.es: Evelia, tiene la edad  de 57 años, esta casada, vive con su esposo e hijos, los cuales son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de semilla de maíz de buena calidad y que se adapte adecuadamente a las condiciones de suelo y clima de la zona, además que tenga una buena característica de  cosecha adecuada al igual que el rendimiento del producto final, además de algunos fertilizantes para aplicarle al cultivo de maíz, también realizar algunos trabajos de labores culturales como lo son la conservación de suelos por medio de realización de canales a nivel para que el agua de lluvia no pueda realizar lavados, principalmente en las partes con mas pendientes, con estas nuevas prácticas de trabajo espera cumplir con el objetivo de tener una plantación con mejor sanidad y un suelo con mas fertilidad y por ende una mejor cosecha. Con esta compra de productos adecuados tendrá una calidad mejor de producto para el consumidor. Es el primer  préstamo que  ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ell no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: Evelia is 57 years old, married, and lives with her husband and children. They are her highest priority. With this loan she intends to buy high quality corn seeds that are adapted to the region's soil conditions and climate, and provide a good crop and yield at harvest. Also she intends to buy some fertilizers to apply to the corn crop and carry out some activities to conserve soil such as digging canals so that the rainwater doesn't wash it away, particularly in the areas that have more slopes. With these new work practices she hopes to have a healthier farm and more fertile soil, and thus a better harvest. By purchasing the correct products she'll have a higher quality product to sell to the consumer. This is the first loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She hadn't had any loans with the state banks, but FUDECOSUR has given her a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: To plant corn.

loans.name: Mark

texts.en: Mark resides in Pagadian City with his family. He is studying Hotel and Restaurant Management in the university and wants to work abroad in the future. It is his desire to gain knowledge, for it is a step to becoming successful. He has borrowed a loan from Gata Daku MPC to pay the school tuition fees for the first semester.  Mark is thankful to GDMPC to have a chance to become professional despite insufficient finances.

loans.use: to pay the school tuition fees for the first semester.

loans.name: John Mico

texts.en: John Mico is a good son of a farmer, who settled in SND Lanao del Norte. He is studying seafaring in the university, and he wants to finish it in order to become successful. He joined GDMPC recently and borrowed a loan, with which to pay his school tuition fee for the semester. He is looking forward to the great chance of earning knowledge, with the help of GDMPC. His part is to pursue knowledge, in order to have a better future.

loans.use: to pay school tuition fee for the semester.

loans.name: Emily

texts.en:
Emily is a 36-year-old, single woman, who is taking care of her two children. She has been operating a jewelry shop for five years, earning an income of KES 15,000 at the end of every month.

Emily was introduced to VisionFund Kenya by a Credit Officer. Now she is servicing her first loan of KES 30,000. She intends to use this amount to buy necklaces, earrings, bangles, and lotions, to sell to her customers on a daily basis.

Emily plans to use the anticipated income to buy a plot of land and hopes to have a bright future and maintain a stable family.

loans.use: to buy necklaces, earrings, bangles, and lotions

loans.name: José Cornelio

texts.es:
José de 34 años de edad, estudio hasta 2º grado, actualmente está casado, ha procreado dos hijos, por el momento él y su familia viven con su mamá. 

José se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 20 años. Además, trabaja como albañil en toda la zona. A su trabajo viaja en automóvil y su horario de trabajo es de 7:00 am a 4:00 pm. 

El préstamo que está solicitando, es para comprar fertilizantes para su cultivo de maíz y herramientas de albañilería.
texts.en:
Jose is 34 years old, went to school through second grade, and is now married. He has two children, and for now he and his family live with his mother. For twenty years, Jose has made a living in agriculture. Besides that, he works as a bricklayer all over the area. He goes to work by car, and his work schedule is 7 a.m. to 4 p.m. 

The loan that he is requesting is to buy fertilizer for his corn crop and bricklaying tools.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer for his corn crop and bricklaying tools.

loans.name: Mario Esaú

texts.es:
Mario de 32 años de edad,  estudió hasta bachillerato y actualmente está soltero. Él vive con su mamá, desde pequeño ha estado con ella.

Mario es empleado de seguridad, tiene 4 años de dedicarse a este trabajo de seguridad en una residencial. También es agricultor en pequeño, cultiva maíz y frijol. Su trabajo queda a una hora de viaje y se traslada en bus urbano. 

El préstamo que esta solicitando a CREDICAMPO, es para comprar fertilizantes para poder fertilizar sus cultivos en buena fecha. Él planea que su cultivo se desarrolle en buen estado y que tenga un buen rendimiento y más ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Mario is 32 years old, studied through high school, and is currently single. He lives with his mother, which he has done since he was a baby. Mario is a security worker. He has worked in residential security for 4 years. He also does small farming, growing corn and beans. His work is an hour away, and he gets there by bus. 

The loan he is requesting through Credicampo is to buy fertilizers to use on his crops. He plans to grow his crops in good condition so that he can have a good yield, and obtain more income for his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers to use on his crops.

loans.name: Ahmmed

texts.en:
Ahmmed is a 31-year-old married man and the father of 4 children. His oldest child is 7 years old and the youngest one is 3 years old. He lives with his family in Sana'a, Yemen. He is from a poor family. Ahmmed has a secondary school education. Due to miserable conditions experienced by his family, he couldn't complete his studies.

Selling home appliances door to door was Ahmmed's first source of income for many years. He started with a small amount of capital. In time, he was able to accumulate a good amount of money and opened a small shop in the capital city of Sana'a. His small shop is the sole source of income for Ahmmed's family.

Unfortunately, the income of this shop is very small. Due to his low income, Ahmmed can't meet all of the demands of his customers. He wants to increase the capital of his small shop, but he doesn't have enough money to do that. For this reason, Ahmmed applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB to purchase different kinds of home appliances and housewares such as cooking pots, ovens, knives, spoons, etc. in order to be able to meet all of the demands of his customers.

Ahmmed looks forward to expanding his business more through opening other home-appliance stores inside the capital city of Sana'a.

loans.use: to purchase different kinds of home appliances and housewares such as cooking pots, ovens, knives, spoons, etc. in order to be able to meet all the demands of his customers.

loans.name: Kanini

texts.en:
Kanini is a single mother, and has three children. She stays at a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees for her children. 

For the past four years, she has been operating a fruit selling business. She sells to her neighbors and passersby. Her major challenge is stiff competition from other fruit sellers. 

With the 30,000 Kenyan shillings (KES), Kanini wants to purchase sacks of fruit at wholesale and resale for a profit. She decided to join Yehu Microfinance Trust to access loans to boost her business and improve her living standards.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fruit at wholesale and resale for a profit

loans.name: Dongyang Group

texts.en: Kong's village takes water from relatively shallow wells and from local streams; however, the water from those natural sources in Kong's village is dirty and unsuitable for drinking, without treatment. The nearby villages also suffer from dirty and unsafe drinking water. Kong is excited that she, like her fellow group member, was able to purchase a water filter. Most families report a threefold reduction in diarrhea after they begin using the filter; this is because the filter removes bacteria and water-borne diseases. Even though some people in the village, including Kong’s, are able to buy bottled water, the water filter increases disposable income to users by decreasing the amount of money they would otherwise have used to purchase bottled water. Kong and other filter users also decrease the amount of money spent to boil water, by purchasing less charcoal or wood, and they can decrease the amount of time they must spend foraging for firewood. Kong's filter is guaranteed for two years, though most users find the filter works from three to five years.

loans.use: to purchase a TerraClear water filters so her family can have access to safe drinking water.

loans.name: Sindulfo

texts.es:
Sindulfo es de la ciudad de Ybycuí, es una persona que quiere salir adelante, es por ello que se está esforzando bastante en sus estudios.
Está estudiando la carrera de derecho, para que el día de mañana pueda ser una profesional útil para si misma y también para la sociedad. Quiere también ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su universidad, de manera a poder seguir luchando por sus sueños y metas. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en: Sindulfo is from the city of Ybycui. He's a person that wants to get ahead, and that's why he's working so hard on his studies. Currently he's studying law, so that in the future he can be a professional that's of use to himself and to society. He also wants to help his family through his work. The loan he's requesting is to invest in the payment of university tuition, so he can continue striving towards his dreams and goals. He's grateful for the opportunity he's receiving, as it will be very helpful to him.

loans.use: To pay for university tuition.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es:
Diego tiene 28 años de edad, es soltero y vive con sus padres y su hermana, por el momento no trabaja ya que le está costando un poco viajar y estudiar al mismo tiempo, pero está en busca de un empleo en donde pueda ejercer sus prácticas a medio tiempo ya que la carrera de medicina le lleva mucho tiempo de estudio. 
Hasta ahora recibe la ayuda de su hermana y un hermano que también es recibido en medicina para pagar sus estudios. Diego solicita el préstamo para compra de libros y pago de una cuota, piensa generar sus propios ingresos dentro de poco y seguir pagando su carrera el mismo.
texts.en:
Diego is 28 years old is single and lives with his parents and his sister. At the moment he is not working as it costs him a bit to travel and study at the same time. But he is looking for part time work where he can get practical experience. His medical studies take up a lot of time.

Up to now he has been receiving help from his sister and his brother who is a graduate in Medicine to pay for his studies. Diego is requesting a loan to buy books and pay his tuition. He hopes to generate his own revenue shortly and continue to pay for his studies himself.

loans.use: to buy books and pay tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase more clothes for ladies and men.

loans.name: Villa Quiquijana Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “VILLA QUIQUIJANA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Quiquijana perteneciente a la provincia de Quispicanchis

La socia es la Sra. Felipa ella es soltera y tiene 63 años y tiene 7 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de restaurant, la socia prepara diferentes platos como pollo con papas, sopas y saltados de carnes, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene 10 años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.
La persona que sale con la cara tapada no pertenece al banco comunal Villa Quiquijana.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de venta de granos, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members of this group belong to the "VILLA QUIQUIJANA" communal bank, which is located in the Quiquijana district, in the Quispicanchis province. 

The borrower is 63-year-old Felipa. She is single and has seven children. She makes a living running her restaurant business. She prepares several dishes such as chicken with potatoes, soups, and "saltado de carne" (beef sauté). She works from 8:00 a.m. to 
5:00 p.m. She has been in this business for 10 years now, and she is doing very well. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. She is requesting a loan to purchase products for cooking such as chicken, meat, and vegetables. 

She is grateful to everyone who is part of this dream by making these resources available, and she promises to make all of her payments on time.

The other members make a living selling animals, selling grains, running a grocery store, and running a restaurant.

The person whose face is covered does not belong to the "Villa Quiquijana" communal bank.

loans.use: La socia solicita el crédito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo, carne y verduras.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza is a coconut wine vendor from Dulag, Leyte. She is a 29-year-old married woman, and a mother of four young children. 

Riza has been engaged in coconut wine-vending for more than six years now. Coconut wine can also be fermented to into a vinegar. She has also raised pigs as her other source of income. 

Riza is asking for a loan to buy more coconut wine. Riza hopes to make her business a success.

loans.use: to buy more coconut wine

loans.name: José Elías

texts.es:
José de 29 años de edad, estudio hasta 6º grado. Es padre de dos hijos  y su esposa se dedica a vender pan en la comunidad. Él trabaja la agricultura, a veces trabaja cerca y a veces trabaja lejos de su casa hasta las 12:00 md. Viaja a pie y también se dedica a la crianza y al engorde de ganado.
