Mercelita has borrowed and paid 16 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the buy and sell charcoal business for 10 years, and also earns an income from a general store.

She aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es:
El campo fértil donde alumbra el sol cada mañana donde los trabajadores hacen presencia para otro día de labrar la tierra y provecharlas al máximo, es el trabajo de Víctor  de 44 años, el motivo por el cual el a acudido a otro préstamo para seguir en el cultivo de papas que el ha venido haciendo hace un tiempo atrás para el beneficio de su familia y su comunidad, 

Cuando no tenía acceso a los préstamos Víctor no sacaba buena cosecha, pera gracias a los préstamos que el ha venido realizando el a podido tener muy buena cosecha para tener una mejor producción y realizar el cultivo de papas para el beneficio de su comunidad y la de su familia y como una fuente de ingresos económicos.

La inversión que realizara para el nuevo préstamo es para la compra de semillas de papa y fertilizantes, ya que es muy importante para la producción de papa, para tener  buena cosecha de su familia y comunidad. 

El cambio que Víctor obtuvo por medio de su préstamo es la ventaja de tener un capital para poder superarse en la vida y le ayudo a desarrollar y abrir campos en la venta de sus productos.
 
Uno de las aspiraciones de Víctor es llegar a la ampliación de sus siembras y darles educación a sus hijos para que sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
The fertile fields where the sun shines every morning  and the workers come for another day to work the land to the max is where Victor works. 

He is 44 years old and he is asking for another loan so he can continue growing potatoes which he has been doing for some time to benefit his family and his community. Before having access to the loans Victor was not getting very good harvests, but thanks to the loans he has been able to increase his output and get good harvests, resulting in a source of income for his family. The new loan will be used to invest in potato seeds and fertilizer which is very important for potato production and for a good harvest.  The change that Victor has experienced in getting his loan is the advantage of having capital to overcome some of life's challenges. It helped him to develop and open up fields for selling his products. 

Victor's aspirations are to increase his plantings and to give his children an education so they can become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Hamadah

texts.en:
Hamadah is a 19-year-old single young man from Nablus city, who appears in the photo . He lives with his family in a small simple house. 

His father works as a construction worker where he gets a low and unstable income. This is the only source of income for the family. 

Hamadah is a student in a local university and specializes in social service. He would like to take the BA degree and find a job in the future. 

He took a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a laptop for his studies. By taking this loan, he will be able to read articles

loans.use: to buy a laptop for his studies

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is 62 years old and married with nine children. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks like bread, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc., to sell.

Maria has been in this business for three years and sells a variety of items such as bread, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc. 

In the future, Maria would like to repair and renovate her family home.

loans.use: to buy additional stocks like bread, noodles, detergent soap, shampoo, fabric conditioner, etc., to sell

loans.name: Marlyn

texts.en:
As a married parent of three children, Marlyn works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell vegetables business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from farming rice and buy and sell charcoal.  Marlyn is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to  buy additional vegetables to sell for her buy and sell vegetables business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Marlyn has been sustaining her business activities through her past 15 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell

loans.name: Cecelia

texts.en:
Cecelia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business buying and selling rice in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 8 years and earns additional income from farming vegetables. Cecelia successfully paid back her previous loan and has now requested an additional loan to further build her business. She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to purchase more sacks of rice to sell. 

Cecelia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina works hard to support her family. She is married and has a general store business in the Philippines. has been in this business for two years now.

She requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store. Marina would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en:
Zenaida is 70 years old and a widow with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Zenaida has an upholstery business in the Philippines. Zenaida requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy raw materials for her upholstery business.

Zenaida has been in this business for 15 years. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business and repair her family's home.

loans.use: to buy raw materials for her upholstery business.

loans.name: Janet

texts.en:
Janet is a married woman with three children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Janet is 40 years old, and has three children who are in school.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines. Janet requested a PHP 16,000 loan amount through NWTF in order to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

Janet has been in this business for four years. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for her fishing boat.

loans.name: Merlina

texts.en:
Merlina is 22 years old and has two children. She is married, and has two children who are in school.

Merlina is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Merlina requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to purchase vitamins, vaccines and other supplies for her livestock.

Merlina has been raising livestock for three years now, and has borrowed four times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Merlina would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, vaccines and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a showcase, an assortment of cosmetics, hair products, and hair dryers and irons to complement her services.
